programme.title: Frozen Planet II - EP 4
programme.desc: Antarctica is the most hostile of all earth's frozen worlds. Yet even here, amongst some of the most challenging conditions on the planet, life finds a way not just to survive, but thrive. Our journey begins at the far edge of the continent, on its far-flung sub-Antarctic islands. Here we meet king penguins that, to feed at sea, must face the danger of ferocious leopard seals lurking in the shallows.

If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: On Our Watch
programme.desc: Arturo unsuspectingly introduces an algorithm that cost him his job, fiancée and his friends. In his loneliness, he grows attached to Stella, a hologram, who he might lose if he can’t renew his subscription. Will Arturo find love and freedom again?

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: Submission
programme.desc: Lúcia is raped by her husband and presses charges against him. In her quest for justice, she must battle her husband who is the son of the State's Vice Attorney, and the Portuguese legal system with its patriarchal beliefs.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: 180 Degree Rule
programme.desc: Sara, a schoolteacher from Tehran, is preparing to attend a wedding in northern Iran with her family. When her husband suddenly forbids her from going, she hatches a plan to go in secret. But her choice soon places her on a painful path to atonement.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Sleepless Nights
programme.desc: Jen Hansen’s death seems by all accounts to be the tragic result of a deadly robbery. However, Sievers suspects that there is foul play afoot as his investigation unearths the skeletons in the pilot’s closet involving his brother and lover.

programme.title: A Far Shore
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Aoi is an underage mother struggling to make ends meet and dealing with her husband’s violent temper. After her husband loses his job, their continuous fights lead them to a social downfall.

programme.title: Midnight At The Paradise
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, three couples are pulled into a collision course of sexual chemistry, delusion, forgiveness and hope as they explore what love, death, desire and the magic of the movies mean to them.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: On Our Watch
programme.desc: Arturo unsuspectingly introduces an algorithm that cost him his job, fiancée and his friends. In his loneliness, he grows attached to Stella, a hologram, who he might lose if he can’t renew his subscription. Will Arturo find love and freedom again?

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: Lahore Bhojnalay
programme.desc: A man on a mission right in the heart of enemy lines, gets help from a stranger, who sees right through his disguise.

programme.title: Dad Got Grounded
programme.desc: Paul is a great pilot, but after breaking his promise to retire early to care for their son, his wife leaves him. Faced with having to take care of their son and his two other children by himself, Paul must show that he is a good father to win her back.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: A Far Shore
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Aoi is an underage mother struggling to make ends meet and dealing with her husband’s violent temper. After her husband loses his job, their continuous fights lead them to a social downfall.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: Love Child
programme.desc: Iranian couple, Leila and Sahand, is forced to flee from Tehran with their illegitimate son as their illicit affair is punishable by death. Filmed over the course of five years, the documentary follows the family's journey as they seek refuge in the west.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the Côte Sauvage.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: Mammal
programme.desc: Margaret (Rachel Griffiths), a silently grieving divorcee forms an intense bond with Joe (Barry Keoghan), a homeless youth. Their oedipal relationship is threatened by the wrath of Margaret’s ex-husband and Joe’s involvement with a gang of violent youths.

programme.title: Dad Got Grounded
programme.desc: Paul is a great pilot, but after breaking his promise to retire early to care for their son, his wife leaves him. Faced with having to take care of their son and his two other children by himself, Paul must show that he is a good father to win her back.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: Our River...Our Sky
programme.desc: Baghdad. Sara, a single mother and novelist, shocked into silence by the surrounding violence, has been unable to write. She and her neighbours struggle to resist the fragmentation of their world and renew a fragile sense of hope for a better future.

programme.title: Light Years (2021)
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their father’s old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.
